description:
The Single Business Registration (RUE) was created by Article 11 of Law 590 of 2000, in November 2013, and integrates the Commercial Register and the National Register of Bidders, and will also incorporate and integrate the following records:

* Registration of Non-Profit Institutions
* Public National Register of vendors Games of chance
* Public Registry of citizen oversight
* National Tourism Registry
* Register of Foreign Entities of Private Law Non-Profit
* Registration Solidarity Economy
* Unified Offeror Registry (RUP)

The Single Business Registration and Social (RUES) is administered by the Chambers of Commerce.
guidanceOnLocatingIds:
Search through the online interface. 

Some identifiers are provided with a checksum (e.g. 900876653-3).
name: Single Business Register / Al Registro Único Empresarial
onlineAccessDetails: It is possible to search the register online
